name: Through time the girl puzzle
description:
Join the Community

Join our Discord channel：https://discord.gg/AgEPhfMJQN


It has been a busy day, and both your body and mind need some relaxation. Why not try this light-hearted casual game?

In between the game, you can also get to know them, understand them, and delve deeper into their personalities!


But it's not just about the game – there are also thrilling special scenes!


But remember, don't share this with anyone else.

Click, relax, level up, collect items.

Each of them, exclusively for you, awaits you to explore their most intimate moments!

• Engage in flirtatious banter with 8 girls!
• 50 challenging puzzles
• Use skills to devise strategies
• Up to 120 different branching dialogues for various scenarios
• Enjoy the in-game gallery

P.S. This work marks the return of the philosophy team, building upon the foundation of resources from the collection of beautiful girls, adding a plethora of special scene actions, storyline, and casual gameplay inspired by "Mosaique Neko Waifus." We hope everyone enjoys it!
